TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class OdbcConnection : System.Data.Common.DbConnection, ICloneable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcConnection extends System.Data.Common.DbConnection implements class System.ICloneable
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcConnection Inherits DbConnection Implements ICloneable
public ref class OdbcConnection sealed : System::Data::Common::DbConnection, ICloneable
type OdbcConnection = class inherit DbConnection interface ICloneable

summary.span: 表示到数据源的连接是打开的。

span.span: Represents an open connection to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象都表示对使用连接字符串或 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 创建的数据源的唯一连接。An object represents a unique connection to a data source created by using a connection string or ODBC data source name (DSN). 使用客户端/服务器数据库系统，它相当于网络连接到服务器。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 具体取决于本机 ODBC 驱动程序，某些方法或属性的支持的功能对象可能不可用。Depending on the functionality supported by the native ODBC driver, some methods or properties of an object may not be available. 对象使用本机资源，例如 ODBC 环境和连接句柄。The object uses native resources such as ODBC environment and connection handles. 应始终显式关闭任何打开对象通过调用或**Dispose**之前对象也会超出范围，或通过将放置在连接`Using`语句。You should always explicitly close any open objects by calling or **Dispose** before the object goes out of scope, or by placing the connection within a `Using` statement. 不执行此操作会使垃圾回收这些本机资源的释放。Not doing this leaves the freeing of these native resources to garbage collection. 它可能不会立即释放它们。It might not free them immediately. 此操作，又，最终会导致基础驱动程序耗尽所有资源或达到最大限制。This, in turn, can eventually cause the underlying driver to run out of resources or reach a maximum limit. 这会导致出现间歇性故障。This has resulted in intermittent failures. 例如，你可能会遇到`Maximum Connections`-与相关的错误时的多个连接正在等待垃圾回收器删除。For example, you might experience `Maximum Connections` -related errors while many connections are waiting to be deleted by the garbage collector. 显式关闭连接允许使用更高效的本机资源，增强可伸缩性并提高应用程序的整体性能。Explicitly closing the connections allows for a more efficient use of native resources, enhancing scalability and improving overall application performance. > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高性能应用程序，您通常必须使用连接池。To deploy high-performance applications, you frequently must use connection pooling. 但是，当对 ODBC 使用.NET Framework 数据提供程序，您不必启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理。However, when you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. 如果一个的`Execute`的方法类将导致严重(例如，SQL Server 严重级别为 20 或更高版本），可能会关闭。If one of the `Execute` methods of the class causes a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater), the may close. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 创建的实例的应用程序对象可以要求所有直接和间接调用方拥有足够的权限的代码通过设置声明性或命令性安全要求。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 使用创建安全请求对象。 creates security demands by using the object. 用户可以验证其代码通过使用具有足够的权限对象。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 用户和管理员还可以使用代码访问安全策略工具 (Caspol.exe) 来修改安全策略的计算机、 用户和企业级别。Users and administrators can also use the Code Access Security Policy Tool (Caspol.exe) to modify security policy at the computer, user, and enterprise levels. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md). 有关处理来自数据源的警告和信息性消息的详细信息，请参阅[连接事件](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the data source, see [Connection Events](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/connection-events.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 打开，并设置为属性。The is opened and set as the property. 该示例然后调用，并关闭连接。The example then calls , and closes the connection. 若要实现此目的，传递连接字符串和一个 SQL INSERT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新实例时创建后，只写和只读属性设置为以下初始值，除非专门设置使用在其关联的关键字属性。When a new instance of is created, the write-only and read-only properties are set to the following initial values unless they are specifically set using their associated keywords in the property. |属性Properties|初始值Initial value| |----------------|-------------------| ||空字符串 ("")empty string ("")| ||1515| ||空字符串 ("")empty string ("")| 您可以更改这些属性的值只能通过使用属性。You can change the value for these properties only by using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并打开。The following example creates and opens an . summary.span: 在数据源中开始事务。

span.span: Starts a transaction at the data source.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction BeginTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 在数据源中开始事务。

span.span: Starts a transaction at the data source.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提交或回滚事务，必须显式使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 事务管理模型，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如所提供的数据源。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果不指定隔离级别，将由正在使用的驱动程序确定的隔离级别。If you do not specify an isolation level, the isolation level will be determined by the driver being used. 若要指定隔离级别，其中方法中，使用的重载的`isolevel`参数。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `isolevel` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A transaction is currently active.
Parallel transactions are not supported.
Connecting to Data Sources

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提交或回滚事务，必须显式使用或方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要确保正确执行.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 事务管理模型，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如所提供的数据源。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和一个。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用， ，和方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ChangeDatabase(string value) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ChangeDatabase (value As String)

span.span: The database name.

summary.span: 更改与打开的 关联的当前数据库。

span.span: Changes the current database associated with an open .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数必须包含有效的数据库名称，并且不能包含 null 值、 空字符串 ("")，或只有空白字符的字符串。The `value` parameter must contain a valid database name, and cannot contain a null value, an empty string (""), or a string with only blank characters. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和更改当前数据库。The following example creates an and changes the current database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The database name is not valid.
The connection is not open.
Cannot change the database.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭到数据源的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回滚所有挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后释放到连接池连接，或如果禁用连接池时关闭连接。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 如果调用时处理事件，无需额外的事件触发。If is called while handling a event, no additional events are fired. 应用程序可以调用不止一次，而不会生成异常。An application can call more than one time without generating an exception. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 数据提供程序使用用于 ODBC 时，您无需启用连接池，因为 ODBC 驱动程序管理器会自动管理。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the ODBC Driver Manager manages this automatically. 有关如何启用和禁用连接池的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft 开放式数据库连接 (ODBC) 文档。For more information about how to enable and disabling connection pooling, see the Microsoft Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) documentation. > [!CAUTION] > 不要调用或`Dispose`连接、 DataReader 或在任何其他托管的对象上`Finalize`类的方法。Do not call or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，您应仅释放类直接拥有的非托管的资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅[垃圾回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建、 将其打开，显示的某些属性，然后关闭连接。The following example creates an , opens it, displays some of its properties, and then closes the connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: public override string ConnectionString { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property ConnectionString As String

member this.ConnectionString : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=10.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开数据源的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open a data source.

value.span: 包括一些需要建立初始连接的设置（例如，数据源名称）的 ODBC 驱动程序连接字符串。

span.span: The ODBC driver connection string that includes settings, such as the data source name, needed to establish the initial connection.
The default value is an empty string ("").

value.span: 最大长度是 1024 个字符。

span.span: The maximum length is 1024 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设计为尽可能与 ODBC 连接字符串格式相匹配。The property is designed to match ODBC connection string format as closely as possible. 可设置仅当连接关闭，并且只要它设置它传递时, 保持不变，驱动程序管理器和基础驱动程序。The can be set only when the connection is closed, and as soon as it is set it is passed, unchanged, to the Driver Manager and the underlying driver. 因此，对于语法必须完全匹配哪些驱动程序管理器和基础驱动程序支持。Therefore, the syntax for the must exactly match what the Driver Manager and underlying driver support. 可以使用属性，以连接到各种数据源。You can use the property to connect to a variety of data sources. 这包括 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN)。This includes an ODBC data source name (DSN). 下面的示例说明了几个可能的连接字符串。The following example illustrates several possible connection strings. ``` "Driver={SQL Server};Server=(local);Trusted_Connection=Yes;Database=AdventureWorks;" "Driver={Microsoft ODBC for Oracle};Server=ORACLE8i7;Persist Security Info=False;Trusted_Connection=Yes" "Driver={Microsoft Access Driver (*.mdb)};DBQ=c:\bin\Northwind.mdb" "Driver={Microsoft Excel Driver (*.xls)};DBQ=c:\bin\book1.xls" "Driver={Microsoft Text Driver (*.txt; *.csv)};DBQ=c:\bin" "DSN=dsnname" ``` > [!NOTE] > 用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持`Persist Security Info`其他.NET Framework 数据提供程序支持的关键字。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support the `Persist Security Info` keyword that is supported by other .NET Framework data providers. 但是，属性的行为就像`Persist Security Info`已设置为`false`。However, the property behaves as if `Persist Security Info` were set to `false`. 这意味着您不能检索从密码属性如果在打开连接。This means that you cannot retrieve the password from the property if the connection has been opened. 当属性从读取已打开的对象，则返回连接字符串减去密码。When the property is read from an object that has been opened, the connection string is returned minus the password. 不能更改此行为;因此，如果应用程序要求密码，单独进行存储，然后再调。You cannot change this behavior; therefore, if the application requires the password, store it separately before calling . 许多字符串中指定的设置具有相应的只读属性 (例如， `Server=(local)`，它对应于属性)。Many of the settings specified in the string have corresponding read-only properties (for example, `Server=(local)`, which corresponds to the property). 打开连接，除非检测到错误后，会更新这些属性。These properties are updated after the connection is opened, except when an error is detected. 在这种情况下，不会更新任何属性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 属性 (如) 只返回默认设置或在指定的那些设置。 properties (such as ) return only default settings or those settings specified in the . 在 Microsoft.NET Framework 1.0 版中，连接字符串的验证才会应用程序调用方法。In the Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.0, validation of the connection string does not occur until an application calls the method. 它负责的基础 ODBC 驱动程序来验证连接字符串。It is the responsibility of the underlying ODBC driver to validate the connection string. 如果连接字符串包含无效或不受支持的属性，该驱动程序可能会引发在运行时。If the connection string contains invalid or unsupported properties, the driver may raise an at run time. 但是，在.NET Framework 1.1 版和更高版本中，连接字符串的一些基本验证，就会发生设置属性。However, in the .NET Framework version 1.1 and later versions, some basic validation of the connection string occurs as soon as you set the property. 在该时间的数据提供程序验证的连接字符串是否满足"关键字 = value;..."格式，但它不会验证关键字或值是否有效。At that time, the data provider verifies that the connection string meets the "keyword=value;..." format, but it does not verify whether keywords or values are valid. 当应用程序调用时，基础 ODBC 驱动程序会执行剩余的验证方法。The remaining verification is performed by the underlying ODBC driver when the application calls the method. ODBC 连接字符串具有以下语法：An ODBC connection string has the following syntax: ``` connection-string ::= empty-string[;] | attribute[;] | attribute; connection-string empty-string ::= attribute ::= attribute-keyword=attribute-value | DRIVER=[{]attribute-value[}] attribute-keyword ::= DSN | UID | PWD | driver-defined-attribute-keyword attribute-value ::= character-string driver-defined-attribute-keyword ::= identifier ``` 其中`character-string`具有零个或多个字符;`identifier`具有一个或多个字符;`attribute-keyword`不区分大小写;`attribute-value`可以是区分大小写; 和 DSN 关键字的值不会不能仅由空白。where `character-string` has zero or more characters; `identifier` has one or more characters; `attribute-keyword` is not case sensitive; `attribute-value` can be case sensitive; and the value of the DSN keyword does not consist only of blanks. 由于连接字符串和初始化文件语法，关键字和属性值应避免使用包含字符 []{}（)，;？\* = ！ @ 不括在大括号。Because of connection string and initialization file grammar, keywords and attribute values should be avoided that contain the characters []{}(),;?\*=!@ not enclosed with braces. DSN 关键字的值不能只包含空格，且不应包含前导空格。The value of the DSN keyword cannot consist only of blanks and should not contain leading blanks. 由于系统信息的语法，关键字和数据源名称不能包含反斜杠 (\\) 字符。Because of the grammar of the system information, keywords and data source names cannot contain the backslash (\\) character. 应用程序不需要驱动程序关键字之后添加的属性值两边的大括号，除非该属性包含用分号 （;），在这种情况下需要使用大括号。Applications do not have to add braces around the attribute value after the Driver keyword unless the attribute contains a semicolon (;), in which case the braces are required. 如果驱动程序收到的属性值包含大括号，驱动程序不应删除它们，但它们应是返回的连接字符串的一部分。If the attribute value that the driver receives includes braces, the driver should not remove them but they should be part of the returned connection string. 用大括号括起来的 DSN 或连接字符串值 ({})，其中包含任何字符 []{}（)，;？\* = ！ @ 传递不变到驱动程序。A DSN or connection string value enclosed with braces ({}) that contains any of the characters []{}(),;?\*=!@ is passed intact to the driver. 但是，当在关键字将这些字符，驱动程序管理器时使用文件 Dsn，将返回错误，但将连接字符串传递给正则连接字符串的驱动程序。However, when you use these characters in a keyword, the Driver Manager returns an error when you work with file DSNs, but passes the connection string to the driver for regular connection strings. 避免使用嵌入的大括号中的关键字值。Avoid using embedded braces in a keyword value. 连接字符串可能包含任意数量的驱动程序定义的关键字。The connection string may include any number of driver-defined keywords. 由于 DRIVER 关键字不使用来自系统的信息，该驱动程序必须定义足够的关键字，以便驱动程序可以连接到数据源连接字符串中使用的信息。Because the DRIVER keyword does not use information from the system, the driver must define enough keywords so that a driver can connect to a data source using only the information in the connection string. 该驱动程序定义到数据源连接所需的关键字。The driver defines which keywords are required to connect to the data source. 如果在连接字符串中有重复任何关键字，则将选择的值不能保证。If any keywords are repeated in the connection string, there is no guarantee which value will be selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果 ODBC 驱动程序支持连接字符串长度超过 1024年个字符，可以使用数据源名称 (DSN) 超过最大长度限制。If an ODBC driver supports connection strings longer than 1024 characters, you can use a data source name (DSN) to exceed the maximum length limitation.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ConnectionTimeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在尝试建立连接时终止尝试并生成错误之前所等待的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待连接打开的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for a connection to open.
The default value is 15 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与用于 SQL Server 和 OLE DB 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序，用于 ODBC 的.NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持此属性设置为连接字符串值，因为它不是有效的 ODBC 连接关键字。Unlike the .NET Framework data providers for SQL Server and OLE DB, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support setting this property as a connection string value, because it is not a valid ODBC connection keyword. 若要指定连接超时值，设置属性之前调用。To specify a connection time-out, set the property before calling . 这相当于设置 ODBC `SQLSetConnectAttr` SQL_ATTR_LOGIN_TIMOUT 属性。This is equivalent to setting the ODBC `SQLSetConnectAttr` SQL_ATTR_LOGIN_TIMOUT attribute.

span.span: The value set is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取当前数据库的名称或打开连接后要使用的数据库的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.
The name of the current database.

value.span: 在打开连接前，默认值一直为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("") until the connection is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，在连接字符串中设置属性。At first, the property is set in the connection string. 属性可以通过使用更新方法。The property can be updated by using the method. 如果您更改当前数据库使用的 SQL 语句或方法中，发送一条信息性消息，然后更新的属性。If you change the current database using an SQL statement or the method, an informational message is sent and then the property is updated. 检索属性相当于调用 ODBC 函数`SQLGetInfo`与`Attribute`参数设置为 SQL_ATTR_CURRENT_CATALOG。Retrieving the property is equivalent to calling the ODBC function `SQLGetInfo` with the `Attribute` parameter set to SQL_ATTR_CURRENT_CATALOG. ## Examples 下面的示例创建和更改当前数据库。The following example creates an and changes the current database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnlistDistributedTransaction(class System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**实现此目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 你可以继续在现有使用分布式的事务中登记方法如果禁用自动登记。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在现有分布式事务中登记可以确保，提交或回滚事务，如果数据源的代码所做的修改也提交或回滚。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md). 如果返回的异常已经启动了事务使用。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 但是，如果该事务是在数据源启动的本地事务 (例如，通过显式执行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 语句使用对象)，回滚本地事务，并在现有登记作为请求的分布式的事务。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 不会收到通知，本地事务已回滚，并且负责不管理任何本地事务使用。You will not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增 ADO.NET 2.0 中功能支持使用方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 因为登记中的连接实例， **EnlistTransaction**利用中提供的功能用于管理命名空间的分布式事务，使其优于**EnlistDistributedTransaction**，使用该**System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction**对象。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它还具有略有不同的语义： 后显式事务上登记连接，不能取消登记或第一个事务完成之前在另一个事务中登记。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅[分布式事务](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions.md).

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String) As DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

summary.span: 使用架构名称的指定名称，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified name for the schema name.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`collectionName`为 null，包含有关所有可用的元数据和任何限制的信息。When `collectionName` is null, the contains information about all available metadata and any restrictions. > [!NOTE] > 将应用于的所有限制`SQLStatistics`方法也适用于`ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes")`集合。All restrictions that apply to the `SQLStatistics` method also apply to the `ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes")` collection.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 通过使用指定字符串作为架构名称，指定字符串数组作为限制值，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`collectionName`指定为 null，包含有关可用的所有元数据和其限制的信息。When `collectionName` is specified as null, the contains information about all the metadata that is available, and its restrictions. `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*深度的值指定的特定集合的限制集合。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要将值设置给定的限制，并且未设置其他限制的值，必须设置前面的限制条件，则为 null，然后将放在你想要为指定值的限制为适当的值。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you must set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. 此示例是"表"集合。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果"Tables"集合具有三个限制 （数据库、 所有者和表名称），并且想要返回仅具有所有者"Carl，"相关联的表，则需要在至少传递以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name), and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl," then you would need to pass in at least the following values: null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这将是相同的映射与传入 null，这是传入空字符串作为参数值不同。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ("") 被视为可指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. > [!NOTE] > 将应用于 SQLStatistics 方法的所有限制将都适用于 ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes") 集合。All restrictions that apply to SQLStatistics method will apply to the ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes") collection.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event InfoMessage As OdbcInfoMessageEventHandler

summary.span: 在 ODBC 驱动程序发送警告或信息性消息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the ODBC driver sends a warning or an informational message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要处理警告或信息性消息，由服务器发送客户端应创建委托来侦听此事件。Clients that want to process warnings or informational messages sent by the server should create an delegate to listen to this event.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 指定的属性设置打开到数据源的连接。

span.span: Opens a connection to a data source with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 绘制从连接池中的打开的连接，如果有可用。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否则，它在建立与数据源的新连接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果超出范围，它表示该连接不会不会自动关闭。If the goes out of scope, the connection it represents does not close automatically. 因此，必须显式关闭连接通过调用， **Dispose**，或通过将放置在连接`Using`语句。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling , **Dispose**, or by placing the connection within a `Using` statement.

exception.span: 此方法的功能在基类中不受支持，并且必须改为在派生类中实现。

span.span: The functionality of this method is unsupported in the base class and must be implemented in a derived class instead.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ReleaseObjectPool() cil managed

summary.span: 指示当释放最后的基础连接时可以释放 ODBC 驱动程序管理器环境句柄。

span.span: Indicates that the ODBC Driver Manager environment handle can be released when the last underlying connection is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReleaseObjectPool` 可以调用以释放 ODBC 环境句柄。`ReleaseObjectPool` can be called to release the ODBC environment handle. 您可能想要调用此方法，如果，例如，连接对象将不再次使用。You might want to call this method if, for example, the connection object will not be used again. 当在环境中的所有连接都将都关闭时，可以释放环境。When all connections in the environment are closed, the environment can be disposed. 请注意，仅仅调用此方法不会实际释放环境中存在的活动连接。Note that calling the method alone does not actually release the active connections that exist in the environment. 最后释放环境之前，必须执行以下操作：The following must occur before the environment is finally disposed: 1. 调用释放环境中的对象。Call to release the object from the environment. 2. 允许每个连接的对象。Allow each connection object to time out. 3. 调用 。Call . 4. 调用垃圾回收。Invoke garbage collection. 相反，如果在调用上的所有活动连接，并调用垃圾回收，但不是调用，保留环境的资源保持可用。Conversely, if you call on all active connections, and invoke garbage collection, but do not call , the resources reserved for the environment remain available. 释放环境句柄后，新的请求创建一个新环境。After an environment handle is released, a request for a new creates a new environment.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个包含客户端所连接到的服务器的版本的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the version of the server to which the client is connected.
The version of the connected server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不受基础 ODBC 驱动程序，为空字符串 ("") 返回。If is not supported by the underlying ODBC driver, an empty string ("") is returned. 属性采用的形式 '*# #。 # #。 # # #*，其中的前两个数字的主版本，接下来的两位数字是次版本，并最后四位数的发行版本。The property takes the form '*##.##.####*,' where the first two digits are the major version, the next two digits are the minor version, and the last four digits are the release version. 驱动程序必须呈现此窗体中的产品版本，但也可以附加以字符串形式的特定于产品的版本 (例如，"04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1")。The driver must render the product version in this form but can also append the product-specific version as a string (for example, "04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1"). 此字符串的形式 '*major.minor.build*其中*主要*并*次要*是两个数字和*生成*正是四个数字位数。This string takes the form '*major.minor.build*' where *major* and *minor* are exactly two digits and *build* is exactly four digits.

span.span: The connection is closed.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState
public: virtual property System::Data::ConnectionState State { System::Data::ConnectionState get(); };

summary.span: 获取连接的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the connection.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面被允许的状态更改：The following are allowed state changes: - 从`Closed`到`Open`，并使用方法。From `Closed` to `Open`, using the method. - 从`Open`到`Closed`，使用或**释放**方法。From `Open` to `Closed`, using either the or **Dispose** method. > [!NOTE] > 调用上打开的连接属性会增加应用程序系统开销，因为每个此类调用会导致 SQL_ATTR_CONNECTION_DEAD 调用基础 ODBC 驱动程序来确定连接是否仍有效。Calling the property on an open connection increases application overhead because each such call causes a SQL_ATTR_CONNECTION_DEAD call to the underlying ODBC driver to determine whether the connection is still valid.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
